column1: #Text=" Lin says : " I do n't know how to tell you this ... you 're going to Ba Sing Se ... with the prince .
#Text=" Lin says : " I tried to get you out of it , but it 's over my head .
#Text=He says he does n't know what he 'd do without you .
#Text=" Mako says : " This ca n't be happening !
#Text=I 'm not even an Earth Kingdom citizen ; I work for the Republic City Police Department .
#Text=You 're just a pawn in Raiko 's diplomatic game .
#Text=You can try talking to him , but I do n't think he 's going to let you quit .
#Text=" Mako says : " " Acolyte says : " There 's a Southern Water Tribe ship pulling up to the dock !
